text: hi everyone, do you have any tips to optimize the UX on mobile for an embeded meeting widget on an external website ? As it is an iframe my developers tell me that they can't do much Here is the page <https://www.ilobysomfy.fr/rendez-vous.html>

Hi, it seems that the Module API has been under construction for almost a year, hopefully someone of you had a similar issue and could advice :crossed_fingers:

We need to localise all the page contents, but the *contents of the modules are not included in the JSON* that we get from HubSpot. We see though the module_id and are able to retrieve it with an extra call, yet what we receive is a long list of content (over 6000 lines for a small module). We were looking for a PATCH call to insert the translation into the right spot. Has anyone tried or knows of a PATCH method? We tested POST, but this is a bit too experimental in our case.
Thanks!
